attributes.action: Withdraw Cervarix immediately until more is known about it's long term effects.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
More and more children are suffering severe reactions to this vaccination. The latest is the death of a 14 year old in Coventry.
No one knows the long term effects of this drug and yet our government are more than happy for OUR CHILDREN to be vaccinated with it.

Please read up on the effects of Cervarix and Gardacil as it is known in the US and then sign this petition.
